title: An Attention-Based Stochastic Simulator for Multisite Extremes to Evaluate Nonstationary, Cascading Flood Risk
summary: This paper introduces an attention-based stochastic simulator for multisite extremes to evaluate nonstationary, cascading flood risk. It addresses compound flood risks from spatially and temporally clustered extremes, which challenge traditional risk models. The simulator aims to unify spatial and temporal extremes under low-frequency hydroclimatic variability and large-scale moisture transport.
